212993.name: Debate Night in America
212993.description:
A Modern-Day Mythos-Inspired Adventure

From the introduction:

Senator Frank Gold is in the fight of his life for his coveted Senate seat in the great state of Maryland. A mid-50s stately African American Democratic politician with a graying beard, balding head and bulky physique, Senator Gold has been a mainstay of political life but a series of embarrassing personal scandals have opened the race up to Republican challenger, Racquel McBrennan, a 40-something red-haired newcomer to the political scene. Racquel has lit up the contest with a fiery base of support who want change - even if she does not have quite the same level of experience as Senator Gold. But Frank is struggling under the weight of scandals - improperly filed tax returns, questions of kickbacks, and mysterious health issues - all of which he denies.

212994.name: Follow the Giant's Cloud
212994.description:
From the introduction:

With the sudden Giant attacks happening across Faerûn Several characters attempt to find out why. One Such Cloud Giant has though of a Deviously Evil Plan to harm those who worship the newly ascended God Nim-Aer in their Afterlife. What is his evil plan can the party stop him? Only one way to find out.

212995.name: No Way Out
212995.description:
From the back of the book:
No Way Out è un Mondo di Fate per Fate Accelerato pensato per portare in gioco le storie di zombies e i temi tipici del survival horror e del genere post-apocalittico.

English translation:
No Way Out is a World of Fate Accelerated thought to bring into play the stories of zombies and the typical themes of survival horror and post-apocalyptic genre.

212996.name: Omen
212996.description:
From the publisher website:
Omen è un gioco di ruolo di orrore, presagi e follia, dove vestirete i panni di coloro che leggendo i segni riusciranno a plasmare il proprio destino… O moriranno nel tentativo.

English translation:
Omen is RPG of horror, omens and madness, where you will play the role of those who reading the signs will be able to shape their own destiny ... or will die in the effort

212998.name: Barbarian Primal Paths
212998.description:
From the introduction:

At 3rd level, a barbarian gains the Primal Path feature. Here are three new options for that feature: the Path of the Ancestral Guardian, the Path of the Storm Herald, and the Path of the Zealot.

212999.name: Ultima Ratio Basic Rules (Preview edition)
rpg: ULTIMA RATIO: Im Schatten von MUTTER
212999.description:
From the game website:
The Lukean Empire has returned to its former strength. The exclusively virtual Reichs-Kredit-Einheit (RKE) is the leading currency of known space. The population of the Reichsplaneten Lukea in the system S01 rejoices in their prosperity.

213000.name: Thro' Centuries Fixed
213000.description:
Publisher Blurb:

You wake groggy; your body stiff, your sight obscured. You stir; vigour oozing slowly back into your muscles like you’ve slept for an age. As your vision clears, you find your surroundings unfamiliar, the colours and light queer. You struggle to call out for help, but cannot find the words; You struggle to remember much of anything – were you drunk? Drugged? Sick?

Perhaps, with hindsight, you were better not knowing…

Thro’ Centuries Fixed is a new adventure for The Cthulhu Hack or your Mythos-based horror investigation game of choice. A modern era adventure, flexible enough for a one-shot or a short series of sessions.

212501.name: Fifty Silver Ingots
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212501.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Doing the right thing in the Bandit Kingdoms can result in a dozen wrong things; it only takes one wrong thing to kill you.

An adventure for characters level 1 - 8.

212502.name: Spirits of Vengeance
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212502.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

In a deserted street on a cold winter night, the spirits of the past cry out for vengeance. Are you crazy enough to enter a temple of unspeakable evil and seek out the source of its power?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 10.

212503.name: The Quick and the Dead
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212503.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A "chance" encounter with an ogre patrol in the Warfields has you headed to Hallorn to do a little R and R and R (Rest, Recreation, and Research).

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

212504.name: Pawn
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212504.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The arrival of the Bonefist Legion in Rookroost has everyone on edge.

An adventure for characters level 3 - 10.

212505.name: Alhaster Fog
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212505.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Rumors of an army forming in the Warfields lead prudent individuals to move as far from the battlefield as possible. Prince Zeech’s capital at Alhaster should be a quiet place to avoid the upcoming war — until His Grace summons you for a personal interview.

An adventure for characters level 4 - 12.

212506.name: Trouble at Baco Canyon
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212506.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A request to escort a funeral wagon of an old acquaintance seemed like a good way of getting out of sight after some of the things you have done to Old Wicked’s forces. After all, who would ever come looking for you in the Rift Barrens?

An adventure for characters level 4 - 12.

212507.name: Torrock's Bane
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212507.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Torrock, a powerful ogre leader, continues to spread evil, death and ruin throughout the Bluff Hills region. Can you bring an end to his rampage?

An adventure for characters level 4 - 12.

212508.name: Trail of the Apprentice: An All-Ages Adventure Path (Pathfinder)
212508.description:
From publisher blurb:

On the Trail of Adventure!

The theft of a mysterious artifact launches a group of heroes on a desperate quest to unmask a hidden foe and stop his plans to unleash a terrible evil upon the world. Only by following clues, getting help from some unlikely sources, and overcoming great challenges will the heroes be able to discover who their enemy is and what plans are unfolding to threaten the good people of Threll. Will their strength, willpower, and talent be enough to win the day?

Trail of the Apprentice is a five-part campaign for 1st- through 5th-level characters, using the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game rules. Designed to provide a series of exciting adventures suitable for all ages, especially new and younger players, this book includes all five adventures, advice sidebars, new rules options for simplified versions of the game, and campaign setting information to help bring the lands of Terrallien to life. Bring home this amazing adventure saga and make your next family game night Legendary!

212509.name: High Ho Silver
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212509.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The forces of Cranzer have long held the silver mines in the Rift Barrens, but now is the chance for his enemies to strike back!

An adventure for characters level 4 - 12.

212510.name: Trail of the Apprentice: An All-Ages Adventure Path (5E)
212510.description:
From publisher blurb:

On the Trail of Adventure!

The theft of a mysterious artifact launches a group of heroes on a desperate quest to unmask a hidden foe and stop his plans to unleash a terrible evil upon the world. Only by following clues, getting help from some unlikely sources, and overcoming great challenges will the heroes be able to discover who their enemy is and what plans are unfolding to threaten the good people of Threll. Will their strength, willpower, and talent be enough to win the day?

Trail of the Apprentice is a five-part campaign for 1st- through 5th-level characters, using the 5th Edition rules. Designed to provide a series of exciting adventures suitable for all ages, especially new and younger players, this book includes all five adventures, advice sidebars, new rules options for simplified versions of the game, and campaign setting information to help bring the lands of Terrallien to life. Bring home this amazing adventure saga and make your next family game night Legendary!

212511.name: Quick 'n' Easy
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212511.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

One of Rookroost’s social elites is missing. Where has she gone? Why should you care?

An adventure for less than honorable characters [level] 2 - 12.

212512.name: The Pale Lady
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212512.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Rumors abound about strange happenings in the Fellreev Forest. Nothing unusual there, right... wrong! You have received a message from Fort Hendricks requesting your assistance. Will you go to their aid or will you leave them to perish?

An adventure for characters level 3 - 12.

212513.name: Change in the Air
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212513.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

General Hok is preparing to find a stronghold to use as a base of operations. As he initiates this final campaign before the winter, he has another matter that must be dealt with.

212514.name: Let Loose the Hounds
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212514.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A man, a dog, and a broken down wagon lead the adventurers on a path towards retribution and redemption.

An eight hour adventure for [character levels] 4 - 10.

212515.name: Trouble at Centaur Mesa
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212515.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A clan of the Rift Barren’s Nomads has awakened something that should stay sleeping. Can you determine what it is and keep the disaster from spreading?

An Adventure for characters level 1-8 who are not outlawed by the Rift Barren’s Nomads, with special significance to members of the Initiates of the Tangles Meta-organization

212516.description:
Keyper is a game with high player interaction for two to four players played over four rounds. Each round represents a season: spring, summer, autumn and finally winter.

Each player starts the game with their own village board, a mini keyp board, 12 village tiles, a keyper (waving meeple) in their player color, and a team of eight multi-colored keyples, including two white keyples. Each differently colored keyple is a specialist in one activity: the brown keyper is a woodsman, the black keyple is a miner, the orange keyple a clay worker, etc. The white keyples are generalists who can represent any other color.

Keyper is a worker placement game. (Keyper is the eighth new title in the medieval Key series of games, with Keydom, the second in the series being widely recognized as the first of the worker placement genre of games.) What makes Keyper special is that when one player places a keyple on a country board, another player can join them with a matching colored keyple on the first player's turn to the benefit of both players. In this way some players are likely to have played all their keyples before others. All keyples have the potential to work twice. If a player has played all of their keyples, but another player still has some, then on their turn the player with no remaining keyples can lay down one or more keyples on the country board they have claimed or in their village board to secure additional resources or actions. It can therefore be doubly beneficial to co-operate with your fellow players, although Keyper is not a co-operative game in the usual sense of the term.

The country boards are also noteworthy in that they can be manipulated and folded at the beginning of summer, autumn and winter to show one of four different permutations of fields for that season. A player will chose the one to suit their strategy, often hoping that another player will complement their choice. Certain fields on the country boards are available only in certain seasons, e.g., raw materials can be upgraded to finished goods only in spring and summer after which you can only convert using tiles in your own village. Gem mining occurs only in autumn and winter.

A player's strategy is likely to be influenced by which (seeded) spring country tiles they acquire and by the particular colored keyples they have available in the later seasons. Different combinations will encourage a player to develop their farm or village, help with their shipping or mining activities, and prepare for the seasonal fairs. Players constantly need to evaluate whether or not to join other players, when to claim a country board, whether to play on their own or another player's country board, when to use their own village, and whether to create a large or small team of keyples for the following season. The winner is the player to gain the most points, usually through pursuing at least a couple of the different strategies.

In addition to the theme and mechanisms, Keyper has similar traits to the earlier Key games: Game actions are positive and constructive, not destructive; player interaction is through the game mechanisms not direct, and like Keyflower, the previous game in the series, there is a lot of player interaction.

A special English-language Kickstarter edition of Keyper with "character" keyples and keypers will also be released.
212516.name: Keyper

212517.name: A Hin of Trouble
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212517.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A chance meeting with an aged halfling leads you to travel to Mercy’s Bluff and search a long abandoned battleground.

212518.name: Emissary
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212518.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

An emissary of the Old One travels to the Fellreev. What his mission is, no one knows. The only thing certain is that things are about to get interesting.

An adventure for [character levels] 2 - 8.

212519.name: Torrock's Legacy
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212519.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A person’s actions in life create a ripple effect that can continue to spread well beyond that person’s lifespan. Torrock is dead. Will Torrock’s legacy continue to spread death and destruction even after his death, or can a few determined heroes create a better ending?

An adventure for characters level 1 - 13.

Part three of the Bluff Hills Silver series.

212520.name: Scales and Secrets
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212520.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Life in the Combination of Free Lords is often about choosing your battles. Sent with a straightforward mission towards the Tangles, perhaps today is a little different. Or is it? With the changes in Hallorn’s leadership, fighting has broken out along parts of the forest. With this brewing chaos, has something dangerous developed, unnoticed by those in power? How will this affect the Warfields?

An adventure for character levels 9 - 15.

This is the third part to the “Legacy of the Highwayman” Series.

212521.name: Of Friends, Friars, and Foes
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212521.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A mysterious stranger wishes you to investigate the death of a local wizard in Stoink. But apparently, he is not the only one interested in the unfortunate occurrence.

A Bandit Kingdoms regional scenario for [character levels] 4 - 12.

The first part in the Fate of the Avenger series.

212522.name: Swamped
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212522.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Lizardmen have been attacking villages and towns in the northern parts of the Theocracy of Dimre. Rumors abound that the attacks have been particularly savage. Now a town-crier gives news of a reward out for brave adventurers willing to eliminate the source of the threat.

A Bandit Kingdoms Introductory module for 1st-level characters only.

212523.name: Octo
212523.description:
Octo is a press-your-luck dice-rolling game where the goal is to set, and then maintain, a high score. Once a player has set the score, it's up to the rest of the players to beat it--and then become the holder of the score themselves.

Players start with eight six-sided dice and roll them all at once, then must set aside at least one of the dice rolled. They may then stop or reroll all dice not set aside. The caveat is that the same face value may not be claimed more than once per turn; once you've set aside two sixes, for example, further sixes you roll cannot be used. If you roll and cannot set aside any of the dice due to them matching previously-rolled values, you bust.

Octo is one of several games Reiner Knizia describes in his book Dice Games Properly Explained.

212524.name: The Artonsamay Falcon
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212524.description:
A Introductory Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A gem long thought lost has suddenly reappeared in Trallant. Can the heroes keep it out of the hands of the forces of Iuz?

An adventure for first level characters only.

212525.name: Johrase Jailbreak
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212525.description:
A Introductory Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The heroes encounter a wounded Johrase Mercenary, left for dead after an ambush gone bad. One of his comrades has been taken captive by the victorious orcs, and he asks the PCs to ensure his safe return... or his permanent silence.

An adventure for first level characters only.

212526.name: You've Got Missive...
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212526.description:
A Introductory Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Fresh in off the farm, you find yourselves taking your ease in the Dirty Dog Tavern in Rookroost. The pretty serving girl, a high-elf, wants you to do her a favor. “No problem,” you think, “piece of cake.” That’s when she tells you that she wants you to deliver a letter to her sister... in the Fellreev.

An adventure for first level characters only.

212527.name: Disappearance of Innocence
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212527.description:
A Introductory Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The road from Hallorn has lead you to a most unusual place. However, even strange things can happen in the most strange of places. A mysterious song is the key to troubled tidings.

User summary:

For 1st level characters.

212528.description:
Tank on Tank: West Front – Defenders of the Rhine is a new expansion to our Tank on Tank: West Front series. In this expansion, Tank On Tank fans can delve into catastrophic armored clashes between the United States and Germany. This expansion includes two maps and many customized scenario rules to add to your gaming experience. Within these ten scenarios, US tanks confront German panzers in devastating battles in villages and over rivers to achieve victory towards the liberation of Europe. Also included for owners of Tank on Tank: East Front is a special bonus scenario, “Patton Strikes West”, which has the US and German forces teaming up in an attempt to push the aggressive Soviet bear back into Motherland. Enjoy hours of added gameplay with this expansion. It’s fun. It’s tactical. Get in a turret and take command!

You must own Tank on Tank: West Front to play Defenders of the Rhine.
212528.name: Tank On Tank: West Front – Defenders of the Rhine

212529.description:
Tank on Tank: East Front – Red Storm in the Valley is a new expansion to our Tank on Tank: East Front series. In this expansion, Tank on Tank fans can delve into catastrophic armored clashes between Germany and the Soviet Union. This expansion includes two maps and many customized scenario rules to add to your gaming experience. Within these ten scenarios, the Soviets confront the Germans in huge armor battles in valleys, depressions and over railroad tracks in order to achieve victory for the Motherland. Also included for owners of Tank on Tank: West Front is a special bonus scenario, “The Bear at the Rhine”, which has Soviet forces attempting to push the US and Germans back to the Rhine River. Enjoy hours of added gameplay with this expansion. It’s fun. It’s tactical. Get in a turret and take command!

You must own Tank on Tank: East Front to play Red Storm in the Valley.
212529.name: Tank On Tank: East Front – Red Storm in the Valley

212530.name: A Voice in the Dark
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212530.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

Things have not been going well for the Rookroost Thieves’ Guild. In fact, the City of Ravens has become a very dangerous place in which to live nowadays. Murder and betrayal are rife within the walls of Rookroost, so why not get in on the action?

An introductory adventure for first level characters only.

212531.name: Of Men & Beasts
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212531.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

Varied groups of rebels and thieves use the concealment of the Fellreev Forest to avoid capture by the forces of the Old One. However, only a select few know the true secrets – and horrors – that lie hidden in the heart of this great wilderness.

This is an introductory module for 1st level characters only.

212532.name: The Mad Mage
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212532.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Introductory Adventure

From the introduction:

You have heard only stories about the mad mage who lives in the northwestern Fellreev. “He claims to be the sole surviving priest of Iuz on Oerth... It is said he razed an entire town to recreate it in Iuz’s image!” Now a mortician in Hallorn humbly requests a mission of daring to recover a holy relic: enter the domain of the Mad Mage!

A two-round Bandit Kingdoms Introductory Adventure for 1st level heroes only.

212533.name: Closure
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212533.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Interactive

From the introduction:

"Who would believe a weapon could force people to attack the person who held it and why would such an abomination ever be forged? The storyteller lost all credibility when he swore that those who fell while wielding it vanished in a flash of white light. But somewhere deep his tale stirred a memory..."

A Bandit Kingdoms regional adventure for [character levels] 2 - 16, and Part 5 of the Bender Series.

212534.name: A Place to Call Home
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212534.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Interactive Adventure

From the introduction:

After a chasm opened in the ground near Thunk's Hunting Lodge during a ceremony held to honor the fallen dwarf Ulfgar, a secret city of duergar was discovered. Can you help the dwarves of the Combination clear out a city of their evil, grey-skinned cousins and, in doing so, help them lay claim to a home of their own?

A Bandit Kingdoms Regional Master Maze Interactive Adventure set below the Tangles during the 8th through 14th of Flocktime, for [character levels] 2 - 14.

212535.name: Through the Silver Mines
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212535.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms [Interactive] Adventure

From the introduction:

Chancellor Marischal Calmert Hind's birthday is approaching. As it is his first birthday in a free Kinemeet, the Johrase are planning a festival and all friends of the Johrase are encouraged to attend. Of course, as all friends of the Johrase know, even celebrations in Kinemeet can take a martial turn without warning, so it is always advisable for those who are not combat ready to avoid Johrase celebrations. Perhaps a plan can be formulated to help recover the missing King of the Johrase...

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms interactive adventure for characters level 1 - 15.

Partake at your own risk. You have been warned. Seriously. No whining in the [Bandit Kingdoms].

212536.name: The Scourge
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212536.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A new temple. An old scourge. The fate of Redhand will be settled this day. Whose side are you really on? Citizens of Redhand and members of the Brotherhood of the Sundered Axe are encouraged to participate in this adventure. PCs that are “Banned from Redhand” may not play this adventure.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms Regional adventure set in the Principality of Redhand for [characters level] 2 - 8.

A roleplay intensive module.

212537.name: Trouble Everywhere You Go
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212537.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Vast forces are on the move as word starts to leak out about a powerful artifact that is rumored to confer the rulership of the Combination of Free Lords to its wearer. Can you win the race for the Iron Crown?

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in various locales for characters level 4 - 14.

This is the third and final part of the Missing Regent series.

Members of the Army of the Warfields, Brotherhood of the Sundered Axe, Citizens of Redhand, Johrase Mercenaries and Moskol’s Legion, and all those who wish to return Duke Gellor to power, are encouraged to play this adventure.

212538.name: For Country, Friends, Kings and Neighbors
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212538.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Finally, the plans have been made, morningstars sharpened, and armor made ready. The Johrase march to war on Riftcrag and Boneheart Cranzer! During the final days before the assault, can you help the Johrase accomplish a variety of missions that will give them the tactical edge in the conflict to come?

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms Regional adventure set in the Tangles, the Rift Barrens, and the Rift Canyon for [character levels] 2 - 16.

The results of the premiere of this event will directly influence the [Bandit Kingdoms] finale interactive, BDKI8-04 All Evil Things.

WARNING! This event features very difficult fights...and should only be played by balanced [adventuring parties] consisting of at least five characters.

Printing Warning: This event contains color maps.

212539.name: The Body
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212539.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Your drinks are interrupted by a screaming woman. What is it that she screams of you ask? She found a body. You think to your self the more things appear different, the more they are really the same.

Part One of Cold Dead Hands.

A scenario for [character levels] 6 - 12.

212540.name: Trouble at Dragon Rift
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212540.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

“Let’s all live in peace and harmony” has to be one of the most uncommon phrases heard amongst the denizens of the Rift Canyon, yet someone is preaching exactly that to the evil humanoids of the Rift. Can you help keep this messenger of peace alive long enough for the message to spread?

An adventure for [character levels] 4 - 12.

212541.name: Escape from Enigma
212541.description:
You have all been trapped in a room by the psychopath Enigma. There’s only one means of escape and you must get the correct tool to unlock the exit. Only one person can escape while the rest will perish. Beware as you do not know the other players’ identities and Enigma might just be one of them.

There are 2 ways to win in highly-addictive game of strategy, deduction and deception from the creators of Mystery Manila:

(1) Be the first person to escape
(2) Be the last person left alive

If you are playing the character of Enigma, the only way to win is to kill everybody else.

Each game box contains the following components:

- 7 Character Cards
- 7 Exit Cards
- 7 Tool Tokens

To start the game, each player is handed at random a Character Card with a specific ability. An Exit Card is randomly drawn and placed faced down in the middle of the table. This card is now the Escape Card.

All remaining Character Cards and Exit Cards are placed in two separate piles near the center of the table. All Tool Tokens are also placed individually at the center of the table.

Everyone closes their eyes. While one person counts loudly back from ten, the player holding the Enigma Character Card opens his eyes, looks at the Escape Card, and places it back to it's original position.

In every game of Escape from Enigma, players take turns doing one of the following actions:

- Take an Exit Card
- Take a Tool Token
- Do Character Card's ability
- Bluff and do another Character Card's ability
- Change your Character Card (except if you are Enigma)
- Attempt to escape (except if you are Enigma)
- Pass

To Escape, a player must call out a Tool Token he owns and peek at the Escape Card. If they match, the player wins the game. Otherwise, that player is eliminated.

When a player is eliminated, all his Exit Cards and Tool Tokens are returned to the center of the table, and the game resumes.

A second way to get eliminated for the game is through bluffing. When a player bluffs and is challenged, the defender and the challenger must show each other their Character Cards. Whoever loses the challenge is eliminated and gives the winner all his Exit Cards and Tool Tokens. The winner may also assume the loser's Character Card.

Will you be the survivor of Escape from Enigma?

212542.name: The Revenge of Johnny Bonasera
212542.description:
User Summary

Adventure game designed in a TV cartoonish style.

212543.name: Super Ninja Hero VR
212543.description:
"super ninja hero vr"is a VR-FPS game(first-person shooting game) that developed based on U3D .Variety of scenes with cool fighting, strong cunning enemies and smart BOSS.Taking up your arms to begin a legend.

Source: The Developer Website.

212544.name: ShotForge
212544.description:
User Summary

A sandbox to build guns.

212545.name: Crispy Chicken
212545.description:
Only you can save Earth from the aliens! They want our last chicken bucket, we want them dead.

Source: The Developer Website.

212546.name: King Machine
212546.description:
User Summary

King Machine is a game about building machines. Explore an abandoned factory, finding useful machinery and gradually building the tools and structures you need to restore the factory to operation.

212547.name: hack_me
212547.description:
User Summary

Hack_me is a hacker simulator game. The main objective in game – is to hack big companies's servers to show people that there is nothing in this world that protected on 100%.

212548.name: Brumm
212548.description:
User Summary

In the spirit of old arcade classics like Super Sprint and old computer racers like Micro Machines, you race on a topdown track.

212549.name: Abode
212549.description:
In Abode you'll visit a Sci-fi noir apartment. Inspired by "escape the room" games.

Source: The Developer Website.

212550.name: Battle Islands: Commanders
212550.description:
User Summary

Take part in major WWII battles in Battle Islands: Commanders, from North Africa to the Eastern Front.

212551.name: Qwixx: Das Duell
212551.description:
Qwixx: Das Duell is a stand alone two player version of Qwixx.

As in Qwixx, players roll colored dice and match them up to fill out a score sheet to maximize how many points they will score at the end of the game. However in this game, rolls can only be used by the active player, but the players will share the same score board and mark their progression with stones of their player color.

Stones can in some cases be "bumped" out by the other player, while other stones are "locked" in permanently. As so, Qwixx: Das Duell features a higher level of player interaction than Qwixx.

At the end of the game, players sum up their scores based on the placent of their stones. The player with the most points is the winner.

212553.description: Four tarot-sized full art cards mini expansion. Expansion contains new district cards with additional rules, which change the game after one of the players steals the Emperor's Jewel.
212553.name: Age of Thieves: Chaos in Hadria

212554.name: Fantasy Interiors
212554.description:
From the publisher's blurb:

"Fantasy interiors"

PAGES: 32 pdf

"Fantasy interiors" is a great resource for Players and DMs to "see" more of fantasy realms.

What's in Fantasy interiors?

The set consists of 10 various floor plans of commoners houses. Each floorplan is available in two versions: with and without grid and as well as a notebook for a GM.

These maps and handouts can be easily printed or presented to players during a session, in order to enrich the locale's description and create a more precise presentation.

Check the preview for details!

212555.name: Trach! gra w zbijanego
212555.description:
The game involves two sets of pieces of dinosaurs: team red and blue.
Each player must try to beat the opponent. The winner is the one who will beat all the dinosaurs from the opponents team or the player who can reach to the base of the opponent with their pawn. Each turn you can move one piece to an adjacent hex, play a special movement card, or launch a little ball from a tiny catapult on your end of the board, trying to knock down opponent's pieces.

212556.name: Wyspa Skarbów
212556.description:
In Wyspa Skarbów players take on the role of expedition commanders who received a message about an old pirate treasure that is hidden on one of the caribbean islands. They embark on a journey to acquire legendary riches.
The player must go through three stages of the game, which in turn will make him closer to the final success.
On the first stage players search for treasure maps in the island to enable further exploration.
On the second stage the objective is to find the key, which makes it possible to open the hidde treasure in the third and final stage.
The winner is the first to overcome all the obstacles
and reach the hidden pirate treasure.

212557.name: Harvest Time Vol. 1
212557.description:
From publisher blurb:

The leaves on trees change color and fall. The air turns cool, then cold. The wind grows stronger and more hateful. Farmers go into their fields and reap the rewards of their hard work over the Spring and Summer.

This time of year brings on images of full moons, hunting deer and rabbits, community meals at long tables outside in the chilly atmosphere.

This is Autumn. This is The Harvest Time.

Inside the pages of this book, you will find a three new monsters, four new magical items, the description for two new rituals, some ideas of who to incorporate the Autumn Equinox and the Harvest Moon into your Questing Heroes games, and a whole new Spell Group.

212558.name: Paladin Spells (PRD)
212558.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Paladin Spells is a simple document that collects the paladin spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is the PRD-Only version, containing information from the PRD.

212559.name: Paladin Spells (3PP)
212559.description:
From publisher blurb:

Echelon Reference Series: Paladin Spells is a simple document that collects the paladin spell list, and all spells in it, for easy use. The spell lists are broken up by level and school, and the spells of each level are grouped together and organized by name.

This is the 3pp+PRD version, containing information from the PRD and select third-party content.

212560.name: Giant Slugs: Slimy Slabs of Mollusk Meat
212560.description:
From publisher blurb:

They’re slimy, they’re squishy, they’re squirmy, and kinda cute in their own way.
And now you can bring the most important monsters ever to the 5th edition of the world’s most popular fantasy roleplaying game.

Whether you want to befriend or behead, Octopus Apocalypse has got you covered with Giant Slugs: Slimy Slabs of Mollusk Meat.

Featuring stats for 5 different age categories of giant slugs:

Ancient Giant Slug
Adult Giant Slug
Young Giant Slug
Giant Slug Squirmling
and even a newly hatched Giant Sluglet

212562.description:
Zagor: Odissea Americana: Molti occhi Promo Card is one of a set of 4 event cards to be added to those in the Zagor: Odissea Americana base game. The cards are simply shuffled in with the base game cards, adding more variety from game to game.

The first 3 italian versions of the cards (Molti occhi, Trampy and Icaro La Plume) were given to the visitors of Lucca Comics & Games 2016, a comics & gameplay festival in Lucca in 2016, and later during other promotional events with the 4th card (Insidie sul fiume). It's one of the first additional cards for the Italian edition of Zagor: Odissea Americana.

Text:

Molti occhi / Many Eyes
Ogni giocatore fuori dal battello sceglie se curarsi una ferita (simbolo) o pescare un oggetto (simbolo) dal mazzo
Any off the boat player chooses either to heal a wound (symbol) or draw an object (symbol) from the deck
212562.name: Zagor: Odissea Americana – Molti occhi Promo Card

212563.name: Say Cheese
212563.description:
Say Cheese is a multiplication board game for students of grade 1 and up. It is designed to get them 14 times more multiplication practice than classroom.

Players take turns pulling a number out of a bag and places it in the play arena. The next player takes another number, checks to see if it is multiple of four (say "Cheese" if it is) and recites its multiplication fact. If correct, they receive all the tokens in play and puts them in their bag.

Game ends when one person has no more tokens and the person with the most wins.

212564.name: Ocean Raiders
212564.description:
Ocean Raiders is an addition board game for students of grade 1 and up. It is designed to get them 11 times more addition practice than classroom.

Ocean Raiders is a simple roll-and-move game where you roll the dice and move your pawn the corresponding number of spaces. If you land on someone else, their pawn is sent back to the start (they found you in the ocean). First player to 49 wins the game.

212565.name: Say Cheese Cafe
212565.description:
Say Cheese Cafe is a multiplication tables board game for students of grade 1 and up. It is designed to get them 14 times more multiplication tables practice than classroom.

Similar to their first product, Cafe is a more advanced version of Say Cheese with the addition of "rotten coins", "dessert coins" and a spinner which sets the "cheese" value to a random number instead of the standard "4" in the base game.

212566.name: Big Catch
212566.description:
Big Catch is a division board game for students of grade 3 and up. It is designed to get them 8 times more division practice than classroom.

Each player draws a card on their turn with a number that must be divided by the current number of islands in play. A token is placed on each island equal to the result, with the remainders being saved for subsequent rounds. These can also be used to move from island to island, creating an area-control mechanism.

There is also an included dry erase slate to help the child work out the problems with long division.

The first to get to "Home Island" wins the game.

212567.name: The Godfather
212567.description:
Not to be confused with The Godfather (2006 video game).

The Godfather is a side scrolling shoot 'em up game released by U.S. Gold in 1991, and whose plot is based on all three films in the Godfather trilogy. The game has five levels of gameplay which reflect the locations seen in the movies, including the streets of New York City, Miami, and the village of Corleone in Sicily.

It was released for several computer formats, including the Commodore Amiga, the Atari ST and DOS-based PCs, with the DOS version coming on six floppy disks.

Critical reception to the Amiga version was mixed, ranging from 40% to 95%. Amiga Computing praised its graphics (five out of five stars), but panned both its gameplay and addictiveness (one star each) and awarded it a below-average 40% overall.

The Godfather is a side scrolling shooter with occasional first person shooter sequences. The object of the game consists of getting to the end of the levels while shooting enemy gangsters on the street. The player must be careful not to hit any innocent people, or the game will end. At the end of every level, there is a boss, as well as brief mini games which must be completed to proceed in the game. The last level consists of taking down an enemy helicopter while protecting Michael Corleone.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Godfather_%281991_video_game%29 The Godfather (1991 video game)]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

212568.name: Fireblaster
212568.description:
Sleve back
Welcome to Fireblaster, the ultimate shoot-em-down type game, featuring fast moving sprites and scrolling stars. The action is non-stop, it won't be long before your brow needs whiping with a cold cloth. The game uses many different types of enemies and each one has its own unique oattern, programmed to destroy you with relentless aggression. How long will you last before you are defeated?

212569.name: Turbo Trax (1989)
212569.description:
User Summary
This game takes the electric slot racing track from the floor to the computer.
Race on prebuild track - or build your own as you would be able to do on the floor. Choose between eight different cars

212570.name: Turbo Trax (1995)
212570.description:
Box back
You feel a sudden rush of adrenaline as the start flag is waved before you. Your foot slams down on the accelerator pedal and the suden surge of power sends your indo car hurtling at breakneck speed down the track. This is the deciding race, this race will will earn you the points needed for stage two of the championshop, will you will or will you fail and crash 'n' burn,

Turbo Trax is the ultimate in over-head racing game action. Experience arcade feeling and speed at its best as you take your wehicle hurtling around the twenty five tracks set in fice very different and challenging enviroments. Take to the wheel of a 4x4 jeep, dune buggy, sports car, 4x4 truck or indy racing car - and hold on!

SPECIAL FEATURES...

1 or 2 player with serial link option (Requires 2 Amigas).
Super smooth scrolling (50hz)
Fantastic 32 colour grahics
Amazing stereo music, speech & sound effect
Shop (for upgrading your vehicles performance)
5 Different vehicles with unique handling
5 Different terrains
4 Play modes

212571.name: The Karate Kid: Part II – The Computer Game
212571.description:
A video game adaptation titled The Karate Kid: Part II - The Computer Game was released in 1986 by publisher Microdeal on Atari ST and Amiga. It is a fighting game similar to The Way of the Exploding Fist in which the user plays the role of Daniel in five fights based on movie scenes. There are also two mini games with digitized images from the movie: Miyagi catching flies with chopsticks and Daniel breaking an ice block

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Karate_Kid%2C_Part_II%23Video_game The Karate Kid, Part II]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

212572.description:
Description from the publisher:

The murky depths of the Pacific ocean conceal untold horrors in Omens of the Deep, a new expansion for Elder Sign, the cooperative dice game steeped in the lore of H.P. Lovecraft’s terrifying mythos. Based on the popular The Call of Cthulhu expansion for the Elder Sign: Omens app, players can now venture forth from the confines of the museum and board The Ultima Thule to combat the Ancient Ones that have begun to stir in the depths of the Pacific.

The new R’lyeh Rising mode of gameplay features two stages as you first navigate the Dark Waters track and then assemble the Amulet of R’lyeh to stop one of three dangerous new Ancient Ones from waking and devouring the world. Engage the newly introduced mission tokens for hard-won rewards and fend off the dogged Deep One Legion as your investigators move to unknown dangers on the Pacific Adventure cards. The depths of the Pacific are filled with fresh terrors that only the bravest can attempt to seal with the power of the Elder Signs in the Omens of the Deep expansion for Elder Sign!
212572.name: Elder Sign: Omens of the Deep

212573.name: Deep Madness: Rise of Dagon
212573.description:
Deep inside the mine, the investigators have stumbled across something sinister. They have previously encountered fear embodied. They have stared into the depths of madness. They have even fought against a madman who sought to dominate their psyches. But how will they be able to defeat a demon born out of the darkness infesting their own souls?

Dagon is coming. And he is not rising from the sea: he is rising from the filth inside your own mind. This is Rise of Dagon, a new expansion for Deep Madness.

Contains:
- 1 Storybook, 3 Scenario boards, and 5 room tiles
- 12 Deep One miniatures
- 5 Hydra miniatures
- 6 Shadow of Filth miniatures with colored bases
- Dagon epic monster miniature
- Dashboards & over 100 cards
Plus:
- Ward Phillips Novelist Kickstarter-exclusive miniature

212574.name: Deep Madness: The Oracle's Betrayal
212574.description:
When the investigators first came to Kadath, they received a vision of a man intent on helping them defeat the terrors rampant in the mining facility. Little did they know that one of their only allies would turn into one of their greatest threats. This is The Oracle’s Betrayal, an expansion for Deep Madness.

Contains:
- 1 Rulebook & 1 Storybook
- 5 room tiles & 3 scenario boards
- 3 Dissected miniatures
- 12 Victim miniatures
- 8 Collector miniatures
- William miniature
- 80 cards
Plus:
- 1 Detective investigator miniature, Kickstarter-exclusive

212575.name: The face of hope: Underground
212575.description:
User Summary

The hero woke up in an abandoned subway station and trying to find a way out. He wants to escape to freedom, go home.

212576.name: Litany in Scratches
212576.description:
3 of Trilemma Adventures, a collection of 1-2 page adventures by Michael Prescott.


From the situation summary:

"The High Uttvelt is a natural labyrinth of hundred-foot cliff walls covering many square miles. A religious order once made its home here, but now only undead and monstrous treasure-seekers inhabit their ruined monastery."

212579.name: Mickey's Poppin' Magic
212579.description:
User summary:

Mickey's Poppin' Magic is a children's pop-o-matic action game with a Disney theme. Players move pegged stand-up tokens (Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Pluto, and Goofy) around the edge of a 3-D plastic popcorn bowl. The playing surface is a series of holes (designed to fit the pegs, of course) with a hidden trigger mechanism underneath. If the pop-o-matic die roller indicates a "popcorn" result the trigger is activated randomly, possibly knocking somebody off the pathway. Players also trigger a random poppin' event when they land on a popcorn space. First player to complete the circle is declared the winner.

Designed for 2, 3, or 4 players ages 4 to 8 years old. No reading is required to play. Spanish rules are included.

boardgameintegration: Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Bass Orange Edition
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Proto Man Red
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Bass Orange Edition
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Proto Man Red
212580.description:
Pixel Tactics is a head-to-head game of tactical combat for two players. Each player has an identical deck of 25 cards, from which they draft a leader. The leader's abilities alter vastly the strategy and playability of every other card in the deck, making the game playable in 25 different ways.

In the game, players take turns placing cards and attacking. Each card can activate in various ways, taking on offensive capabilities in the front rows of the unit, or support powers in the back rows. Cards can also be played as orders – powerful single-time effects that can turn the tide of battle.

Play continues until either player's leader is defeated. A typical game is best of three or five rounds.

Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Blue features 28 characters from Mega Man 1-3 — including Mega Man, Dr. Light, and Robot Masters — and these characters are compatible with all other Pixel Tactics games.
212580.name: Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Mega Man Blue

boardgameintegration: Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Bass Orange Edition
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Mega Man Blue
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Bass Orange Edition
Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Mega Man Blue
212581.description:
Pixel Tactics is a head-to-head game of tactical combat for two players. Each player has an identical deck of 25 cards, from which they draft a leader. The leader's abilities alter vastly the strategy and playability of every other card in the deck, making the game playable in 25 different ways.

In the game, players take turns placing cards and attacking. Each card can activate in various ways, taking on offensive capabilities in the front rows of the unit, or support powers in the back rows. Cards can also be played as orders – powerful single-time effects that can turn the tide of battle.

Play continues until either player's leader is defeated. A typical game is best of three or five rounds.

Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Red features 28 characters from Mega Man 4-6, including Proto Man and Robot Masters, and these characters are compatible with all other Pixel Tactics games.
212581.name: Mega Man Pixel Tactics: Proto Man Red

212582.name: Nymphs
212582.description:
From publisher blurb:

A 13th Age Bestiary-style entry for magical guardians created by the Elf Queen, who gradually leave the Queen’s magic behind and become part of nature’s rhythms—as controlled by the High Druid. What happens to ancient elven secrets when they’re finally allowed to blossom?

212583.name: The Secret Ingredient
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212583.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The Port of Alhaster has been locked down, causing hardship for the local Rhenee traders. A barge captain wants you to recover cargo from his impounded vessel. Do you dare risk the ire of Prince Zeech to recover the man’s precious cargo?

A Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Redhand for [character levels] 2 - 8.

[Characters] that are “Banned from Redhand” may not play this adventure. Part One of Breaking Up is Hard to Do.

212584.name: Mounted Combat
212584.description:
From publisher blurb:

Rules for riding horses, war rhinos, giant lizards, bison, giant spiders, sable antelopes, and other critters into 13th Age battles. If you recognized some of these as Gloranthan creatures, that’s because this issue of the Monthly will include content aimed at 13th Age in Glorantha that will be perfectly at home in other fantasy campaign worlds.

212585.name: A Leather Bound Tome
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212585.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A letter from a previous acquaintance sends you on travels of exploration and discovery in the Warfields. When you have multiple options, how do you determine which choice could save the region, or doom the world?

A Bandit Kingdoms adventure for [character levels] 6 - 12.

Part Two of The Cold Dead Hands Series.

212586.name: The Art of Deception
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212586.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A kinder, gentler Grand Theocracy of Dimre? You would not have believed it without seeing it for yourself. In light of the changes, the door has been opened for negotiations to end the eternal struggle between Szek Winvid of Dimre and Boss Renfus of Stoink over the lower Phostwood. Renfus is looking for an impartial escort for his envoy, and your group seems like just the pawns, err, heroes for the job. Characters that are Banned in Dimre or have the Enmity of Dimre are warned to play at their own risk.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure for [character levels] 6 - 12.

212587.name: Necropolis of the Endless Dawn
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212587.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The legend of Nerull’s Bane is not the fantasy of a child’s tale. The city of the ageless dead truly exists. Rumor comes to you that forces of Iuz desire the Reaper’s Ire for themselves. Now the race is on for this ancient hidden myth. The question is... can you beat the Old One to it?

The third adventure in the “Cold Dead Hands” series.

User summary:

For 8th - 14th level characters.

212588.name: Ebongleam
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212588.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

"Does not the sun bring comfort against the biting cold of Winter? How can one appreciate a good leader if they have not known a taskmaster's whip? Is it not acceptable to work with the forces of darkness if some good purpose is ultimately served? To understand the glory of Light, one must first walk hand-in-hand with Darkness. Dimre and Stoink have begun a new era of cooperation, and through this the glory of the Blinding Light shall purge these lands of evil! But who will be the true power behind the throne?"

A Bandit Kingdoms regional adventure set in the Free City-State Stoink for [characters level] 2 - 8.

212589.name: Hirelings
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
Breaking Up is Hard to Do
212589.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Adventurers don’t spend every day saving old ladies with lost kittens from marauding orcs. Sometimes you have to take the work of a lowly mercenary.

An adventure for [character levels] 2 - 8.

Part Three of the ‘Breaking Up is Hard to Do’ series.

Characters that are Banned in Redhand or have similar negative influence are advised to not play this adventure without a good Disguise check.

212590.name: VR The Diner Duo
212590.description:
You are a chef in VR who need to satisfy your customers in a limited amount of time. Share the experience with a friend in local multiplayer mode. Chaotic levels are waiting for you!

Source: The Game Website.

212591.name: City Car Driving
212591.description:
City Car Driving – realistic car driving simulator, which will help you master the basic skills of the car driving in various traffic conditions, with plunging into the environment most closely resembling the real one.

Source: The Game Website.

212592.name: Intralism
212592.description:
Intralism - fast and hard arcade. Listen to music and match all notes. Master all levels or create your own and challenge friends in the online multiplayer. But remember: wrong button - failed try.

Source: The Developer Website.

212593.name: Social Interaction Trainer
212593.description:
Learn how to conduct yourself in social situations with Social Interaction Trainer.

Source: The Publisher Website.

212594.name: Too Big to Fail
212594.description:
The stated object of the game is to "do everything you can to survive out-of-control government, corrupt unions and environmental weenies who want to destroy your business and livelihood." The object of the game is to be the last player with at least one franchise, or to be the first player to complete four circuits of the board and roll "some snake eyes"; failure to roll two ones on two six sided dice on completing four circuits eliminates that player from the game.

As with many games of this genre, the focus is on political satire rather than game play.

212595.name: That Which Slept
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212595.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

302 years ago, a blood-red Luna appeared over the Flanaess. Since that time, evil cults have celebrated the Festival of the Blood-Moon from the 10th to the 12th of Coldeven. It is at this ominous time that Gaiyle Markhalla has asked you for help. This will turn out to be a Festival the Flanaess does not soon forget.

A Bandit Kingdoms regional adventure for [character levels] 6 - 12.

212596.name: Of Gambits, Gauntlets, and Graves
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212596.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A holy weapon of enormous power is hidden in the Grey Stone Cemetery of Rookroost. The forces of good must move fast lest the forces of evil find it first. But such politics makes strange bedfellows, and successfully retrieving the weapon may require help from less-than-savory sorts.

A Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure for [character levels] 6 - 12.

Part two of the Fate of the Avenger series.

212597.name: Trouble at the Gul Bortha
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212597.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Sometimes secrets thought forgotten are uncovered and problems thought solved are only suppressed. Can you keep the priests of Iuz from discovering a long lost secret before the entire Fellreev is overrun with orcs?

Members of any of the Fellreev Factions and Red Planks are especially encouraged to participate in this adventure.

A Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure for [character levels] 8 - 12.

212598.name: The Last Word
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
Breaking Up is Hard to Do
212598.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A simple man in Balmund has a simple task: guard a small shipment of cargo for a few days. But even the simplest missions tend to embroil you in a complex political web that proves tricky to escape. Who will have the last word when the sun finally sets on this tale of adventure and daring?

Citizens of Redhand, Defenders of Morannon, members of Hellstone Tower, and members of the Brotherhood of the Sundered Axe are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

Part three of the Breaking Up is Hard to Do series.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Balmund for characters level 1 - 7.

212599.name: Grass Roots
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212599.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Cranzer continues his agenda of terror to gain more power; a mysterious woman wishes to find out what his next move will be. Perhaps then his enemies could be a step ahead of him. But she needs help. Are there any brave adventurers willing to aid her? Old Faith Druids, Men of the Rift and members of Moskol’s Legion are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Riftcrag for characters level 1 - 7.

212600.name: Never Stir the Wasp's Nest
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212600.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

“Do not stir a wasp’s nest unless you wish to be stung,” says an old saying. Boss Renfus and the Free City of Stoink have been stirred. Do you wish to be stung? Members of the Stoink Thieves Guild and the Grand Theocracy of Dimre are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

A Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure set in Stoink for [characters level] 2 - 6.

212601.name: Love Letter
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212601.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A charming man with strange red eyes needs your help delivering a note to his beloved. Where does she live? Somewhere deep in the Fellreev, near Lake Aqal. To get there, you'll have to avoid the patrols of Fleishchriver, the dangers of Dahlvier's County, and the various denizens of the Fellreev. Who are you to say no to a man in love?

Members of Fellreev Factions meta-organizations and Old Faith druids are encouraged to participate in this adventure. Having a wilderness oriented PC at the table will prove beneficial during this adventure.

A Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure set in the Rift Barrens, the Kingdom of Johrase, the formerly mighty Freehold, and the western Fellreev for [characters level] 2 - 6.

212602.name: Liebe, Geld und andere Intrigen
212602.description:
Das Beste aus dem Abenteuerwettbewerb präsentiert zum Jubiläum die Bandbreite des Verbrechens! Von Schwindel und Betrug mit durchaus grotesken Zügen über eine knifflige Einbruchserie bis hin zum klassischen Mord: Die Detektive werden keine Zeit haben, sich zu langweilen.

Liebe, Geld und andere Intrigen
von Ralf Sandfuchs
Lord Kelsings Tochter ist einem Heiratsschwindler aufgesessen! Diesen mitsamt der verschwundenen Mitgift dingfest zu machen, so lautet der Auftrag. Eigentlich ist alles klar. Oder? Doch plötzlich verschwindet die „Braut“ und eine Komplizin des Schwindlers taucht auf. Und die Wege der „Mitgift“ sind scheinbar unergründlich.
Nichts ist mehr klar – auch das Ende nicht.


Der Magier
von Natascha Weiler
Man bemerkt durchaus, dass er da war – schließlich versteht er sich auf Effekte und besonders wertvolle Stücke. Die fehlen allerdings, wenn Londons neuer Meisterdieb nach seinem Besuch wieder verschwunden ist. Und zwar so spurlos, dass die Polizei vor einem Rätsel steht, und man von magischen Kräften munkelt …

Die Leiche im Moor
von Martin Dürr und Markus Kühn
Die North York Moors an der englischen Küste sind eine markante Landschaft. Hier gibt es mehr Vögel und Schafe als Menschen. Genau das richtige, um sich vom Alltag in der Stadt zu erholen. Doch dann finden die Detektive das tote Mädchen. Noch vor ein paar Tagen sind sie ihr im Zug begegnet. Der ständige Wind flüstert plötzlich von Geheimnissen und die Menschen im Dorf von der Toten, die eigentlich keiner kannte. Warum also wurde sie ermordet?

212603.name: Dreißig
212603.description:
[from the back of the book]
1986 to 2016 - 30 years Cthulhu in Germany!

From the first edition of Hobby Products to the Intermezzo at Laurin to the continuous success story at Pegasus Games - Cthulhu is undoubtedly the most successful horror-rolegame of all times in German-speaking countries!

Therefore, we celebrate this with four adventures, which revolve around the "30" (Dreißig):

"30 liters of virgin blood" a cult in Boston needs for its ritual. The Investigators are brought into the story as members of a prominent gang and must decide on whose side they stand.

"A photo of 30 stars" reveals the veil between the world and the beyond, driving the explorers across Berlin and Tripoli to Egypt.

"30 ° / 30 °" indicates the position where the explorers are stranded in an emergency landing in the Egyptian desert.

"Filmriss" (black out) confronts the Investigators as a one-shot for CTHULHU NOW with a murder in a cinema ... and still with much, much more.

As a bonus, a detailed review of "30 years of Cthulhu" as well as a list of all publications of Pegasus games for Cthulhu from 1999 to today are included.

212604.name: Of Ruin, Restitution, and Revival
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212604.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

As an aged ruler lies on his deathbed, he passes on a dying revelation of a cataclysmic disaster. Now, you must race against time to prevent the prophecy from coming to fruition by venturing to a place where mortals were not meant to tread. All heroes who call the Bandit Kingdoms home are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

Part three and the conclusion of the Fate of the Avenger series.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in realms beyond for characters level 11 - 15.

212605.name: To Bleed or To Die
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
Breaking Up is Hard to Do
212605.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Either Prince Zeech is preparing for the biggest party of the century or a massive war. Commander Marionnen’s garrison has declared their undying allegiance to the Prince of Redhand and has mobilized along the borders. The cambion commander now looks east towards the former lands of the Reyhu and Duchy of the Artonsomay while Alhaster begins a grand celebration. The armies of the Prince now chant “To bleed or to die for Redhand!”

Members of Hellstone Tower, Citizens of Redhand, members of the Brotherhood of the Sundered Axe and the Defenders of Morannon, are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

Part four and the conclusion of the Breaking Up is Hard to Do series.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Redhand for characters level 7 - 13.

212607.name: The Lone Ranger HeroClix: Mini-Game
212607.description:
Bring the fast-paced Western action of The Lone Ranger to your HeroClix collection! This easy mini-game combines Disney’s new film with the most popular pre-painted miniatures tabletop game for exciting gameplay.

Includes everything new and established players need to get started: Lone Ranger and Tonto HeroClix figures, an exclusive fold-out game board, quick-start rule sheet, scenario sheet, 32 bystander tokens, and dice.

212609.name: El Raja Key Archive
212609.description:
From the publisher's website:

The "El Raja Key Archive" is an interactive, searchable, fully indexed, virtual museum of roleplaying game artifacts from the dawn of the Dungeons & Dragons game!
 
Contained within the Archive are over 1,000 high-resolution scans of adventures, maps and keys, campaign notes, character sheets, and manuscripts from the Original Greyhawk, Kalibruhn, and Blackmoor Campaigns - from the very creation of Dungeons & Dragons!
 
Includes all maps and some keys for Rob Kuntz's Castle El Raja Key, the dungeons where Gary Gygax cut his teeth as Mordenkainen; Rob's manuscript for his lost Dungeons & Dragons Supplement V: Kalibruhn; maps, keys, and notes for over 40 adventures from the Original Greyhawk and Kalibruhn Campaigns including, maps & some keys for 16 of Rob's Original Greyhawk Castle levels, the map for the first ever D&D demo, the Machine Level, at GenCon VII in 1974, and the map for the first ever D&D tournament, Sunken City, and notes, NPC cards, and adventure maps and keys for the Original City of Greyhawk!
 
Along with the high resolution images of these treasures is extensive historical commentary that is fully linked to our searchable index. The El Raja Key Archive uses your internet browser interface to navigate. It can be used on virtually any computer that has a internet browser.

212610.description:
Description from the publisher:

Munchkin Wonderland transports players to the iconic world of Lewis Carroll's Wonderland novels. Move around the illustrated game board. If you land on a monster like the Jabberwock or Cheshire Cat, beat it with a roll of the dice and Treasure cards like Six Impossible Things Before Breakfast, the Vorpal Blade, or Stolen Tarts! Maybe you'll even get help from the Caterpillar or Dormouse.

When the deck of Treasure cards runs out, whoever has the most loot wins!
212610.name: Munchkin Wonderland

212611.name: The Halfling
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212611.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A notorious traitor thought dead has reappeared in a very dangerous place. Are you brave enough to go get him?

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms Regional adventure set in Johrase and the Rift Canyon for [characters level] 2 - 6.

212612.name: In a Manor of Seeking
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212612.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Where have the residents of Groucester gone? Can That Which Slept be stopped? Ever since the negative energy burst almost destroyed High Lady Xavendra’s city, these are the questions that need to be answered. Luckily, you are just the person to find out, or so someone claims. Are they right?

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms winter adventure set in Rookroost, the Fellreev Forest, the Deadlands, and Groucester for characters level 4 - 12.

[Characters] from Fellreevbased meta-orgs, the Hallorn Fencing Academy, bards interested in the Old Lore, and druids of the Old Faith are encouraged to play this event together.

[Characters] from Northern Alliance-based meta-orgs, Death Cultists and members of the Circle of Crimson Stone are encouraged to play this event together.

212614.name: Return to Steelbone Meadows
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212614.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

Within the haunted grounds of Steelbone Meadows lies a dark secret regarding the origin of That Which Slept. Are you strong enough to face the trials that lay therein to recover the forgotten lore?

Members of the Northern Alliance, Army of the Warfields, and Death Cultists are encouraged to participate in this adventure.

Part one of the Gathering of Fiends series.

A Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in the Midlands for characters levels 7 to 13.

212615.name: Proof of Loyalty
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212615.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

An adventurer’s wealth and well-being often relies on tracking down rumors to their source. Following rumors of a person long thought dead has led you to the village of Salfrayfields and a potential source. Before you can confirm or put to rest the rumors, you will need to find something even rarer: proof of loyalty.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in the Bandit Kingdoms for [character levels] 2 to 6.

Part Two of the Missing Regent Series.

212616.name: The Work of Thieves
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212616.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

In the troubled city of Rookroost, one man seeks to set things right. Well, at least he wishes to return things to the way they were. Where will you stand in the coming conflict for Rookroost’s fate? Members of the Rookroost Thieves’ Guild, Drinkers of the Cup of Midnight, and all residents of Rookroost are encouraged to participate in this adventure. PCs Wanted by the Church of Iuz should have a good disguise before playing this adventure.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Rookroost for [character levels] 4 to 8.

212617.name: Trouble at Harpy Hollow
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212617.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

The little hamlet of Ankheg Springs has seen more than its fair share of excitement over the last few years. With the reappearance of the blackguard Arvad Michelson, one wonders if the Lammastide festival presided over by his sister Ilyena will go without a hitch. These could be interesting times in the barrens.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in the Rift Barrens for characters level 1 - 10.

Members of the Old Faith and Citizens of Johrase are encouraged to play this adventure.

Kobold [characters] will find the thorp of Ankheg Springs to be very unwelcoming of their kind.

212618.name: The Mausoleum
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212618.description:
A One-Round Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Regional Adventure

From the introduction:

A troubled man wishes you to locate his liege lord. Are you willing to brave the sinister depths of a house of death to uncover the rotten truth?

Members of the Army of the Warfields, Death Cultists, and Druids of the North are encouraged to participate in this adventure. Part two of the Gathering of Fiends series.

A one-round Bandit Kingdoms adventure set in Hallorn for characters level 6 to 14.

NOTE: This is a combat-intensive module and the management of resources is vital.

212619.name: Little Bit 'o Payback
rpgseries: BDK - Living Greyhawk Bandit Kingdoms Adventure
212619.description:
A Two-Round Living Greyhawk Iuz’s Border States Metaregional Adventure

From the introduction:

As the Johrase make their final preparations before attacking Boneheart Cranzer and Riftcrag, a bold group of adventurers has been called upon to find a way to secretly steal into Splinter Keep, rumored prison of the Johrase King’s soul gem, at the edge of the Rift Canyon. Mission? Determine if the keep holds the gem by kidnapping a high-ranking Iuzian officer. Sounds simple, right? It’s not like there is a gate to the Abyss there or anything. Oh wait, there is? You wouldn’t let that stop you from getting a little bit of payback against the Iuzians, would you?

A two-round combat intensive Bandit Kingdoms Regional adventure set in the Tangles Forest for characters level 6 - 12.

Those who are squeamish at heart should stay home. You have been warned.

Citizens of Johrase and followers of St. Cuthbert, members of Moskol’s Legion and followers of Trithereon, Drinkers of the Cup of Midnight, Druids and followers of the Old Faith, and Dwarves of Morakduum, are especially encouraged to participate in this adventure.

212620.name: Star Wars: Battlefront II (2017)
212620.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, but has not yet been released and made available for purchase. Therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception and a maximum of six can be added.




User Summary

Star Wars: Battlefront 2 is the sequel to Star Wars: Battlefront.

212621.name: Zen Squire
212621.description:
Description from the publisher:

Zen Squire is a 2-4 player card game inspired by medieval marginalia, absurd illustrations found in the margins of medieval illuminated manuscripts. The first edition (released on Kickstarter) includes 72-cards, a 54-card main game plus an 18 card expansion. All illustrations and design elements were produced in pen and ink and hand-painted with watercolor.

The goal of Zen Squire is to collect 1,000 points. Each player begins the game with five cards, drawing one card and playing one card each turn. Cards are played into the area directly in front of each player, this area is your Castle, the total sum of which is your score. Diplomat cards contain positive or negative points. Any player can play Diplomat cards to any Castle. Once your Castle totals to 1,000 points, you win the game.

Challenger and Defender cards contain actions, which can be played to the Discard pile in order for their action to occur. Actions may allow players to draw additional cards, steal cards from opponents, or even swap Castles! Rulers are played to any Castle and pair with a Diplomat card already in that Castle. Rulers cannot be removed by Challenger or Defender cards. Multiple Ruler cards can be paired with the same Diplomat card. Once paired with a Diplomat, Rulers may double that card's points, change a negative value to a positive value, or make that card immune to all actions.

212622.name: Midden of the Deep
212622.description:
04 of Trilemma Adventures, a collection of 1-2 page adventures by Michael Prescott.

From the situation summary:

"In an underground cavern vast beyond measuring stands the Midden, a fossilized dung heap produced by a nest of dragons far above on the roof of the cavern. The nest now abandoned, the midden remains, picked over by scavengers of every stripe.

The outer cavern is completely dark, except for the odd glint of fire from beetles on the slopes."

212623.name: Stellarium of the Vinteralf
212623.description:
01 of Trilemma Adventures, a collection of 1-2 page adventures by Michael Prescott.

From the situation summary:

"The dragon-blasted stellarium inches toward destruction between two mountains. Treasure and eldritch lore will certainly be found within, but you are not the only ones who have come to claim its secrets."

212625.name: Frechdachs
212625.description:
The funny games of the Badgers is played two different ways:

Come Let Us Build A Cave!

All players try to build a cave together. If they manage to surround themselves on all sides with bushes, they have won. If the Frechdachs, however, takes 11 shrub game pieces during the game - the badgers cannot build a cave any more - so he is the winner.

The Search For The Pine Cones.

And again the game begins against the Frechdachs. But this time, every badger has to play for himself and try to collect as many pine cones as possible. Whoever has found most pine cones is the winner. You only know this when all the pieces are taken out of the game, and the number of the depicted pine cones is counted on the flipped side. Did you win now? Or was it the Frechdachs again?

212626.description:
Pack of "Garbage" given out to attendees of Gen Con 2016.

18 new "con" related cards.
212626.name: Garbage Day: Gen Con Promo Pack

212627.name: Flirt: The Card Game
212627.description:
Flirt is a game that gets players winning hearts by "courting" other players for their hearts.

Flirt is best played with friends, and with everyone saying the flavor text, with feelings and with a straight face.

Setup
